data.title: Friday Happy hour
data.text: Decided to try something different then our old favorite establishments. We were able to park in the lot which is saying something because typically it is packed. Good bar. Has the usual bar food. I had the nachos which as you can see from the picture was huge. Good service. Waitress staff was friendly although we got passed around to several different servers while we were there. Lots of locals and the place gets pretty loud. Really smokey. Typically smokers are not a concern but for some reason it was really intense this night. Food was good. Prices were reasonable.

data.title: Miss the onion straws
data.text: Another couple and us occasionally go to AAA before a movie or a performance at Lindenwood University.  It is a "bar" type atmosphere that can be smokey and loud, which we pretty much ignore.  They have pool tables and a lot of TV's with sports on them.  The servers have always been good.  They have a good hamburger.  They used to have great onion straws, which  really drew us to visit AAA.  Unfortunately, they have discontinued serving the onion straws.  The onion peels they now have is not a good substitute for the onion straws.  We will not order onion peels again.

data.title: Why did the amount of food in the wrap disappear?
data.text: I ate lunch with some friends and had the grilled chicken wrap adn was amazed at how big the wrap was!  Then I ordered the wrap to go with $75 worth of other food for the family and could not believe what I got.  Seriously half the size.  Unfortunately, we won't order from there again. :(

data.title: Good burgers and wings
data.text: A neighbor told us about this - so we decided to go and try their burgers for lunch.  We went on a rainy weekday and it was fairly quiet in there.  There were several guys at the bar and only one other booth occupied.  We both had burgers - which were good - but nothing "real special".  (I've had better and worse)  My husband got the onion peels and said he wouldn't get them again.  He likes things crunchy - and they didn't look crunchy to me.  We don't smoke, and smoking is allowed there, but it didn't seem to be too bad.  I didn't have to wash my clothes immediately.  I used the bathroom, and the ceiling was leaking and the floor was a little wet from the rain - so definitely a "bar" type atmosphere.  I'm sure on the weekends it's packed because of being close to the college and they offer a HUGE pizza that I'm sure 3-4 guys could eat, they had pool tables, etc.

data.title: Horrible Pizza
data.text: The burger was good, but the pizza was horrible. I could not even finish I had one piece and that is all I could eat. The pizza had a strange taste I cannot explain. My daughter and I should have known better than to eat the food when we walked in there was a horrible smell I cannot put my finger on. It was not the cigarette smoke either. We got our food to go only because my daughter was so hungry she did not want to try anywhere else. I had heard there food was good, I can say I was very disappointed
